title: Lust Stories
director: Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee, Karan Johar
writer: Radhika Apte, Dibakar Banerjee, Anurag Kashyap
short_cast: Vicky Kaushal, Bhumi Pednekar, Radhika Apte, Neha Dhupia, Manisha Koirala, Akash Thosar, Randeep Jha, Neil Bhoopalam, Jaideep Ahlawat, Sanjay Kapoor, Kiara Advani
cast: Vicky Kaushal, Bhumi Pednekar, Radhika Apte, Neha Dhupia, Manisha Koirala, Akash Thosar, Randeep Jha, Neil Bhoopalam, Jaideep Ahlawat, Sanjay Kapoor, Kiara Advani
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: In the companion to 2013's "Bombay Talkies," four short films by four of India's biggest directors explore love, sex and relationships in modern India.
